name: Zombie Meta (Testing)
description:
Zombie Meta (Testing).

This game is the next mini game to focus mainly on the persistent server replication/testing and NFT integration,

At the moment, the only thing uploaded is the level and the gravity settings to try and replicate the low gravity of the moon.

Controls are WASD to move character,
Space to Jump
Left mouse button to shoot
esc key to close the game
